start: Hello! I'm Yamata no Orochi, a bot that uses the AniList API to search for anime and manga.
language: To change my language, use the buttons below, select the one you want:
new_language: The language has been set to: ${new_language}.
already_language: The language is already set to: ${language}.
anime_usage: Use the command followed by an id or title. Examples: • /anime 123456 • /anime Naruto You can also use the inline mode using the prefix !a or the button below.
manga_usage: Use the command followed by an id or title. Examples: • /manga 123456 • /manga One Piece You can also use the inline mode using the prefix !m or the button below.
user_usage: Use the command followed by an id or username. Examples: • /user 123456 • /user Yonorochi You can also use the inline mode using the prefix !u or the button below.
how_to_use_inline_text: How to use inline mode? Using one of the prefixes below followed by your id or name/title. Prefixes: • !a for anime • !m for manga • !u for user Examples: • @YonorochiBot !a Naruto • @YonorochiBot !m One Piece • @YonorochiBot !u 123456
